Test.Name: Exchange Versions
Test.Description: Exchange Analyzer supports Exchange Server 2013, 2016 and 2019.
Test.IfInfoComments: One or more Exchange servers exist that are not running Exchange 2013, 2016 or 2019.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Exchange servers in the organization are Exchange 2013/2016/2019.

Test.Name: Build Numbers
Test.Description: Check if Exchange Servers are running the latest build.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Exchange Server 2013/2016/2019 servers are running the latest build.
Test.IfWarningComments: One or more Exchange Server 2013/2016/2019 servers are not running the latest build.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange Server 2013/2016/2019 servers are not running the latest build.

Test.Name: .NET Framework Versions
Test.Description: Check if Exchange Servers are running the a supported version of .NET Framework.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Exchange Server 2013/2016/2019 servers are running supported versions of .NET Framework.
Test.IfWarningComments: One or more Exchange Server 2013/2016/2019 servers are not running a supported combination of Exchange and .NET Framework.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange Server 2013/2016/2019 servers are not running a supported combination of Exchange and .NET Framework.

Test.Name: Client Access Namespaces
Test.Description: Check if multiple namespaces exist for a protocol within the same AD site.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Exchange sites have a single namespace per HTTPS protocol.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange sites has more than one namespace per HTTPS protocol.

Test.Name: Server FQDNs in URLs
Test.Description: Check that CAS URLs don't contain server FQDNs.
Test.IfPassedComments: No Exchange HTTPS services have URLs containing server FQDNs.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange HTTPS services has a URL containing server FQDNs.

Test.Name: SSL 3.0 Support
Test.Description: Check that SSL 3.0 protocol support is disabled
Test.IfPassedComments: All Exchange servers have SSL 3.0 disabled.
Test.IfWarningComments: One or more Exchange servers could not be checked for SSL 3.0 status.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange servers do not have SSL 3.0 disabled.

Test.Name: TTL on DNS Entries
Test.Description: Check that TTLs on DNS entries for CAS namespaces are not excessive
Test.IfPassedComments: All CAS namespace DNS records have acceptable TTLs.
Test.IfWarningComments: One or more CAS namespace DNS records have high TTLs.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more CAS namespace DNS records have excessively high TTLs.

Test.Name: POP Service Status
Test.Description: Check the status of the POP services.

Test.Name: POP Secure Login
Test.Description: Check that insecure POP logins are not permitted.
Test.IfPassedComments: No POP services allow insecure logins.
Test.IfWarningComments: One or more POP services may allow insecure logins.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more POP services allows insecure login.

Test.Name: POP Protocol Logging
Test.Description: Check that protocol logging is not enabled for POP.
Test.IfPassedComments: No POP services have protocol logging enabled.
Test.IfWarningComments: One or more POP services has protocol logging enabled.

Test.Name: IMAP Service Status
Test.Description: Check the status of the IMAP services.
Test.IfInfoComments: IMAP service state and start mode information.

Test.Name: IMAP Secure Login
Test.Description: Check that insecure IMAP logins are not permitted.
Test.IfPassedComments: No IMAP services allow insecure logins.
Test.IfWarningComments: One or more IMAP services may allow insecure logins.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more IMAP services allows insecure logins.

Test.Name: IMAP Protocol Logging
Test.Description: Check that IMAP protocol logging is not enabled.
Test.IfPassedComments: No IMAP services have protocol logging enabled.
Test.IfWarningComments: One or more IMAP services has protocol logging enabled.

Test.Name: Database Backups
Test.Description: Check that a database backup has been run in the last 24 hours.
Test.IfPassedComments: All mailbox databases have been backed up within the last 24 hours.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange databases has not been backed up within the last 24 hours.

Test.Name: AD Domain Level
Test.Description: Check that the domains are at the required level.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Active Directory domains meet the required functional level.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Active Directory domains do not meet the required functional level.

Test.Name: AD Forest Level
Test.Description: Check that the forest is at the required level.
Test.IfPassedComments: The Active Directory forest meets the required functional level.
Test.IfFailedComments: The Active Directory forest does not meet the required functional level.

Test.Name: Physical or Virtual
Test.Description: Check whether the Exchange Server is Physical or Virtual.
Test.IfInfoComments: All Exchange servers are physical servers.
Test.IfWarningComments: One or more Exchange servers are a virtual server.

Test.Name: Exchange Install Volume Free Disk Space
Test.Description: Check that the Exchange install volume has 30% or greater free disk space.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Exchange install volumes have greater than 30% free disk space.
Test.IfWarningComments: One or more Exchange install volumes has between 15% and 30% free disk space.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange install volumes has less than 15% free disk space.
